name: Tale of Girl
description:
Welcome to a very long time ago, where magic is commonplace, and your dad has been nicked by an evil dragon beast. You will not stand for this injustice, and vow to get him back from the grasp of your nemesis!

Action platform through four unique levels that will tickle your adventure senses!

Battle five unique henchmen that will stop for nothing to keep you from reaching your ultimate destiny!

Fight the evil dragon creature in his lair, rescue your father from the dark cavern, and bring peace and justice to the lands for ages to come!

Tale of Girl was made in four days, by two guys.

Rik Hendriks: @NotAGameCompany

Yannic Geurts: @xzbobzx

Bobstudios: @BobstudiosGames

Enjoy. :D
